# 词云

```
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import jieba
from wordcloud import WordCloud, STOPWORDS


default_mode =jieba.cut(strcontent)
text = " ".join(default_mode)
stopwords = set(STOPWORDS)
stopwords.add("said")
wc = WordCloud(  
    font_path=r'文泉驿正黑.ttf',  
    background_color="white",   
    max_words=4000,   
    width=1000,
    height=500,
    stopwords=stopwords)  
wc.generate(text)
wc.to_file('ret.png')
# plt.imshow(wc, interpolation='bilinear')
# plt.show()
```
